decks.notes: This deck revolves around using Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander to lead an aggressive playstyle. It includes a variety of powerful creatures and spells to quickly pressure opponents and control the battlefield. The deck features a mix of creatures with strong abilities such as Hullbreacher, Brazen Borrower, and Bonecrusher Giant, along with powerful spells like Lightning Helix, Swords to Plowshares, and Force of Will to disrupt opponents' strategies. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to the colors needed for the deck's powerful spells, while also providing utility lands like Mishra's Factory and Archivist of Oghma. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and efficient control spells.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. Aragorn, King of Gondor, leads the charge with a variety of threats and disruptive spells to control the game and ensure victory. With a mix of powerful creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Brazen Borrower, along with removal like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the match. The inclusion of counter spells like Force of Will and Mana Leak provide protection against opposing threats, while cards like Giver of Runes and Mother of Runes offer protection for key creatures. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive in order to win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive tactics and efficient removal spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. It combines white's removal and protection spells with red's direct damage and aggression. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury is the centerpiece of the deck, providing a powerful threat that can quickly close out games if left unchecked. The deck includes a mix of creatures, removal spells, and utility cards to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to establish early pressure and maintain a strong board presence to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The deck is focused on quickly overwhelming your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Ghyrson Starn, Kelermorph is the commander, providing a strong aggressive presence on the battlefield. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, along with efficient removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning. The goal is to apply early pressure with creatures and then finish off your opponent with burn spells. The deck also has disruptive elements like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect your threats. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and efficient, consistently applying pressure to force your opponent on the defensive.

The deck revolves around utilizing Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd's abilities to create a strong aggro strategy focused on controlling the board with removal spells and protection while also generating value through card advantage and efficient creatures. The deck includes a variety of removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Council's Judgment, as well as protection spells like Mana Tithe and Selfless Savior. It also includes powerful creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition to pressure the opponent and disrupt their game plan. By combining aggressive creatures with disruptive elements and card advantage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory in the 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong presence on the battlefield. It utilizes a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and creatures with evasion to chip away at the opponent's life total. Plagon, Lord of the Beach acts as the commander, providing card advantage and a powerful ability to bounce troublesome permanents. The deck aims to maintain tempo through bouncing, countering, and removing threats, while deploying efficient creatures to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's strategy, the deck looks to secure victory through incremental advantage and aggressive plays.
